column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Sinai sar do
column3: wofii Egypt asaase do firii no n'ekyir afe a otsia ebien no no bosoom a odzi kan no mu dɛ
column5: "Nkyii so ma Israelmba ndzi apaho no wɔ n'aber a wɔahyɛ mu
column7: "bosoom yi ne da a otsia duanan no mu ewimbir
column8: na hom ndzi: dɛ mbrɛ n'ahyɛdze nyinara tse
column9: na mbrɛ no ho mmom nyinara tse no

column2: "Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ wondzi apaho no."
"Na wodzii apaho no wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia duanan no mu
column4: wɔ Sinai sar do: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara

column2: "Na mbanyin bi wɔ hɔ a hɔn ho egu fi wɔ nyimpa bi no fun ho
column3: ma dɛm ntsi woenntum enndzi apaho no da no ara:"

column2: "na mbanyin no see no dɛ
column3: Hɛn ho egu fi wɔ nyimpa bi no fun ho: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wɔakam hɛn
column4: dɛ mma yɛmmfa EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze mmba wɔ n'aber a wɔahyɛ mu wɔ Israelmba no mu?"

column2: "Na Moses see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom ngyina hɔ; ma minketsie dza EWURADZE bɛhyɛ wɔ hom ho."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: Sɛ nyimpa bi no ho gu fi wɔ fun bi ho
column9: ondzi apaho no mma EWURADZE ara:"

column2: "bosoom a otsia ebien no mu da a otsia duanan no ewimbir na wondzi; epitsi boodoo nye fan wenwen na wɔmfa ndzi:"
"mma wonngya mu bi mma onnkodu anapa
column3: na mma wommbu ne biew bi mu so: na dɛ mbrɛ apaho no no ho ahyɛdze no nyinara tse na wondzi."

column2: "Mbom nyimpa no a no ho tsew
column4: na ogyaa dɛ odzi apaho no dze
column5: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen osiandɛ ɔammfa EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze no ammba wɔ n'aber a wɔahyɛ mu
column6: dɛm nyimpa no nsoa no bɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi bɔsoɛ hom mu na oridzi apaho no ama EWURADZE a ɔno dɛ mbrɛ apaho ahyɛdze no tse
column3: na mbrɛ no ho mbra no tse no
column4: na ɔnyɛ: hom nya ahyɛdze kor mfa mma ɔhɔho nye nyia wɔawo no wɔ asaase no do nyina."

column2: "Na da a wɔmaa ntamadan no do sii hɔ no mununkum no bɛkataa ntamadan no do
column3: mekyerɛ dasebuw no: na ewimbir no na ɔwɔ ntamadan no do epue tse dɛ ogya dze kodu anapa."

column2: "Dɛm na ɔtse daa: mununkum no kataa do
"Na aber biara a wɔma mununkum no do ma ɔma noho do fi Buw no do no
column3: ɔno n'ekyir no Israelmba tu kwan
column4: na beebi mbrɛ mununkum no gyinae no

column2: "EWURADZE mbrasɛm do na Israelmba nam tuu kwan
column3: na EWURADZE mbrasɛm do na wɔnam kyeer nsera: aber tsentsen biara a mununkum no tsena ntamadan no do no nyinara wɔtsena nserakyer mu."

column2: "Na sɛ mununkum no kyinkyim ntamadan no do nda pii a
column3: ɔno Israelmba hwɛ EWURADZE ahwɛdodze no do

column2: "Na ɔtɔfabi a mununkum no dzi nda kakrabaa bi wɔ ntamadan no do; nna dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse no wɔatsena nsera no mu
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse no

column2: "Na ɔtɔfabi so a mununkum no wɔ hɔ araa fi ewimbir kodu anapa; na sɛ mununkum no ma noho do anapa a
column3: na woetu: anaa sɛ ɔwɔw do adzekyee nye adzesaa
column4: na sɛ mununkum no ma no ho do a

column2: "Sɛ nda ebien o
column5: nna mununkum no kyinkyim wɔ ntamadan no do tsena do a
column6: Israelmba no tsena nsera no mu
column7: na wonntu: na sɛ ɔma no ho do a

column2: "EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm na wɔnam do kyeer nsera
column3: na EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm na wɔnam do tui: wɔhwɛɛ EWURADZE n'ahwɛdodze do
column4: wɔ EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm a ɔnam Moses ne nsa do hyɛɛ no do."
